name: GOND GOND REVOLUTION
description:
While exploring his now-legless spaceship, Gondola stumbles across a neglected DDR machine... Can he DANCE to the MAX and get a perfect score?!

This game is part of the interactive webcomic Gondolaquest. Read the comic to play it in context!

>> READ GONDOLAQUEST! <<

>> JOIN OUR DISCORD! <<

If you notice any bugs, feel free to tell us here or on Github.

Credits:

  • Programming: lilliesea & luumi
  • Art: lilliesea
  • Music and SFX: luumi

Soundtrack available on Bandcamp and SoundCloud!
